title: Best 4chan reader but minor annoyances prevent it from getting 5 stars
comment: Overall a great 4chan reader, far better than viewing on the mobile site. Easy scrolling, viewing and replying. Great gallery feature means you can see all the images quickly without having to go through the thread. Very easy to save, post, and share content on other services.  However minor annoyances prevent this from getting 5 stars. These include:  - rotating the device will take you out of your thread/gallery and take you to the top of the board  - grid thumbnail gallery is only accessible from the top of a thread  - in gallery mode you can read the text post accompanying the image but it there is no link to the thread and any links to other posts cannot be followed from within gallery  - displays latest posts of a thread at the board level, but tapping on the post will still take you to the top of the thread  - lack of ID colouring and highlighting makes it difficult to keep track of who's who in a thread (inb4 anon)

title: Good... But...
comment: The app is nice but I am really getting annoyed at how the app saves pictures. Not only does it save images at a lower resolution than the image is, it saves it in its own folder so your gallery is full of randomly named folders with a single picture in each one... Why?!?!  Maybe its just the hr section that does this but it's incredibly annoying and makes the app useless, which is disappointing considering I decided to get the paid version.
Fixed now, only saves to one folder and only when you select download.

title: The best, but could be better
comment: Definitely the most beautiful app out there for 4chan, but it does need a little work. The app itself is solid, but I feel like the way it organizes information isn't. For example, boards are sorted by their letter, but that letter is never shown. Instead of showing an image representing that board, why not a large version of that board's domain? Like, for /g/, instead of some cyborg, show the characters "/g/". It would be much easier to navigate.  Love supporting /g/ devs. Will buy key if fixed.
Boards now have letters at the top of each card such as /g/.
